class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        d = [i for i in range(n)]
        cnt = n - 1
        ans = []
        for u, v in queries:
            l = bisect_left(d, u)
            r = bisect_left(d, v)
            k = max(r - l - 1, 0)
            cnt -= k
            for i in range(k):
                d.pop(l + 1)
            ans.append(cnt)
        return ans
